ovdesc.P: Correction utility used to alter the sequence of transactions in TRN.CON.TRADE.DATE OR TRN.CON.VALUE.DATE for the date specified in TRADE.VALUE.DATE field. Date specified in TRADE.VALUE.DATE cannot be less than today

desc.p: Mandatory input.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
The following values are permitted: YES NO
Standard T24 date field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the SEC.ACC.MASTER file.

t.desc:
The sub account field.
Validation Rules:
Optional field
0-16 characters

desc.p: Fields SEQUENCE.NO to OLD.SEQ.NO form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the SC.TRANS.NAME file.
Fields SEQUENCE.NO to OLD.SEQ.NO form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 12 characters may be entered.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the NOMINEE.CODE file.
Fields SEQUENCE.NO to OLD.SEQ.NO form a related multi value set. Standard T24 amount field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 12 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the SECURITY.MASTER file.
Fields SEQUENCE.NO to OLD.SEQ.NO form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Fields SEQUENCE.NO to OLD.SEQ.NO form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 21 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Standard T24 customer field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CUSTOMER.SECURITY file.
Standard T24 rate field.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 15 characters may be entered.
